ESRI_ItemInformation.name: PJM_Market
ESRI_ItemInformation.snippet: This feature class/shapefile is for the Homeland Infrastructure Foundation Level Database (HIFLD) (https://gii.dhs.gov/HIFLD) as well as the Energy modelling and simulation community.
ESRI_ItemInformation.description: This feature class/shapefile represents electric power Independent System Operators. Independent System Operators were set up by the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) to provide non-discriminatory access to power and to more adequately administer the transmission grid on a regional basis throughout North America. The following updates have been made since the previous release: updated attribution using best available sources.
ESRI_ItemInformation.summary: This feature class/shapefile is for the Homeland Infrastructure Foundation Level Database (HIFLD) (https://gii.dhs.gov/HIFLD) as well as the Energy modelling and simulation community.
ESRI_ItemInformation.title: PJM Market

ESRI_ItemInformation.accessinformation: Oak Ridge National Laboratory (ORNL), Los Alamos National Laboratory (LANL), Idaho National Laboratory (INL), National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency (NGA) Homeland Security Infrastructure Program (HSIP) Team
ESRI_ItemInformation.licenseinfo: None (Public Use). Users are advised to read the data set's metadata thoroughly to understand appropriate use and data limitations.
